posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I didn't have much interest in these cards as a full lot, so I've priced them individually.  Prices include shipping.  Paypal gift only, please.  I had a lot of trouble uploading scans, so if you would like better, individual scans, just let me know and I can email them to you before or after work.  PM or email me with any questions.  [url]Lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

The Ellam and White back scans separated for some reason
Added individual prices.  Happy to listen to offers on larger groups.

Thanks, Luke, for your reply.
But I don't have Carey or Hooper.
I'll get back to you if anything else turns up.

Doug
Sold some, traded some.  The rest are cheaper.
